players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "'I believe we should focus our votes on Charlie, as he was the one found dead last night. Let's work together to eliminate any potential mafia among us.'..."
Diana: "I agree with Bob that we should focus our votes on Charlie. Let's not let fear and suspicion divide us. We need to work together as a town to uncover the truth."

You: "I think we should consider the possibility that there might be more than one mafia in our midst. Let's not jump to conclusions too quickly and try to gather more information before making any decisions."

Diana: "I believe Alice's suggestion that there could be more than one mafia in our midst is a valid concern. Let's try to gather more information before making any hasty decisions. We should focus on building trust and working together as a town to uncover..."

Bob: "Let's continue to work together and gather more information before making any decisions. I believe that focusing on building trust among us as a town will be crucial in uncovering the truth. We should also consider the possibility that there could be more than one mafia..."
